Using SOAPv1.1/HTTPv1.1 as the transport mechanism.                                                                                       </xsd:documentation>   <xsd:documentation>History:  N/A                                                                                       </xsd:documentation>  </xsd:annotation>  <xsd:element name = "namePartType">   <xsd:simpleType>    <xsd:restriction base = "xsd:string">     <xsd:maxLength value = "32"/>     <xsd:minLength value = "1"/>     <xsd:whiteSpace value = "preserve"/>    </xsd:restriction>   </xsd:simpleType>  </xsd:element>  <xsd:element name = "namePartValue">   <xsd:simpleType>    <xsd:restriction base = "xsd:string">     <xsd:maxLength value = "256"/>     <xsd:minLength value = "1"/>     <xsd:whiteSpace value = "preserve"/>    </xsd:restriction>   </xsd:simpleType>  </xsd:element>  <xsd:element name = "partName">   <xsd:complexType>    <xsd:sequence>     <xsd:element ref = "namePartType"/>     <xsd:element ref = "namePartValue"/>    </xsd:sequence>   </xsd:complexType>  </xsd:element>  <xsd:complexType name = "NameDType">   <xsd:sequence>    <xsd:element ref = "nameType" minOccurs = "0"/>    <xsd:element ref = "partName" maxOccurs = "unbounded"/>   </xsd:sequence>  </xsd:complexType>  <xsd:element name = "pobox">   <xsd:simpleType>    <xsd:restriction base = "xsd:string">     <xsd:maxLength value = "32"/>     <xsd:minLength value = "1"/>     <xsd:whiteSpace value = "preserve"/>    </xsd:restriction>   </xsd:simpleType>  </xsd:element>  <xsd:element name = "extadd">   <xsd:simpleType>    <xsd:restriction base = "xsd:string">     <xsd:maxLength value = "128"/>     <xsd:minLength value = "1"/>     <xsd:whiteSpace value = "preserve"/>    </xsd:restriction>   </xsd:simpleType>  </xsd:element>  <xsd:element name = "locality">   <xsd:simpleType>    <xsd:restriction base = "xsd:string">     <xsd:maxLength value = "64"/>     <xsd:minLength value = "1"/>     <xsd:whiteSpace value = "preserve"/>    </xsd:restriction>   </xsd:simpleType>  </xsd:element>  <xsd:element name = "region">   <xsd:simpleType>    <xsd:restriction base = "xsd:string">     <xsd:maxLength value = "64"/>     <xsd:minLength value = "1"/>     <xsd:whiteSpace value = "preserve"/>    </xsd:restriction>   </xsd:simpleType>  </xsd:element>  <xsd:element name = "postcode">   <xsd:simpleType>    <xsd:restriction base = "xsd:string">     <xsd:maxLength value = "32"/>     <xsd:minLength value = "1"/>     <xsd:whiteSpace value = "preserve"/>    </xsd:restriction>   </xsd:simpleType>  </xsd:element>  <xsd:element name = "country">   <xsd:simpleType>    <xsd:restriction base = "xsd:string">     <xsd:maxLength value = "64"/>     <xsd:minLength value = "1"/>     <xsd:whiteSpace value = "preserve"/>    </xsd:restriction>   </xsd:simpleType>  </xsd:element>  <xsd:element name = "street">   <xsd:simpleType>    <xsd:restriction base = "xsd:string">     <xsd:maxLength value = "128"/>     <xsd:minLength value = "1"/>     <xsd:whiteSpace value = "preserve"/>    </xsd:restriction>   </xsd:simpleType>  </xsd:element>  <xsd:complexType name = "AddressDType">   <xsd:sequence>    <xsd:element ref = "pobox" minOccurs = "0"/>    <xsd:element ref = "extadd" minOccurs = "0"/>    <xsd:element ref = "locality" minOccurs = "0"/>    <xsd:element ref = "region" minOccurs = "0"/>    <xsd:element ref = "postcode" minOccurs = "0"/>    <xsd:element ref = "country" minOccurs = "0"/>    <xsd:element ref = "street" minOccurs = "0" maxOccurs = "3"/>   </xsd:sequence>  </xsd:complexType>  <xsd:element name = "gender">   <xsd:simpleType>    <xsd:restriction base = "xsd:string">     <xsd:enumeration value = "Male"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "Female"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "Gender"/>    </xsd:restriction>   </xsd:simpleType>  </xsd:element>  <xsd:element name = "disability">   <xsd:simpleType>    <xsd:restriction base = "xsd:string">     <xsd:maxLength value = "32"/>     <xsd:minLength value = "1"/>     <xsd:whiteSpace value = "preserve"/>    </xsd:restriction>   </xsd:simpleType>  </xsd:element>  <xsd:element name = "bday" type = "xsd:date"/>  <xsd:complexType name = "DemographicsDType">   <xsd:sequence>    <xsd:element ref = "gender"/>    <xsd:element ref = "disability" minOccurs = "0" maxOccurs = "unbounded"/>    <xsd:element ref = "bday" minOccurs = "0"/>   </xsd:sequence>  </xsd:complexType>  <xsd:element name = "institutionRoleType">   <xsd:simpleType>    <xsd:restriction base = "xsd:string">     <xsd:enumeration value = "Student"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "Faculty"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "Member"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "Learner"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "Instructor"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "Mentor"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "Staff"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "Alumni"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "ProspectiveStudent"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "Guest"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "Other"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "Administrator"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "Observer"/>    </xsd:restriction>   </xsd:simpleType>  </xsd:element>  <xsd:element name = "primaryRoleType" type = "xsd:boolean"/>  <xsd:complexType name = "InstitutionRoleDType">   <xsd:sequence>    <xsd:element ref = "institutionRoleType"/>    <xsd:element ref = "primaryRoleType"/>   </xsd:sequence>  </xsd:complexType>  <xsd:element name = "telType">   <xsd:simpleType>    <xsd:restriction base = "xsd:string">     <xsd:enumeration value = "1"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "2"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "3"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "4"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "Voice"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "Fax"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "Mobile"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "Pager"/>    </xsd:restriction>   </xsd:simpleType>  </xsd:element>  <xsd:element name = "telValue">   <xsd:simpleType>    <xsd:restriction base = "xsd:string">     <xsd:maxLength value = "32"/>     <xsd:minLength value = "1"/>     <xsd:whiteSpace value = "preserve"/>    </xsd:restriction>   </xsd:simpleType>  </xsd:element>  <xsd:complexType name = "TelDType">   <xsd:sequence>    <xsd:element ref = "telType" minOccurs = "0"/>    <xsd:element ref = "telValue"/>   </xsd:sequence>  </xsd:complexType>  <xsd:element name = "imgType">   <xsd:simpleType>    <xsd:restriction base = "xsd:string">     <xsd:maxLength value = "32"/>     <xsd:minLength value = "1"/>     <xsd:whiteSpace value = "preserve"/>    </xsd:restriction>   </xsd:simpleType>  </xsd:element>  <xsd:element name = "extRef">   <xsd:simpleType>    <xsd:restriction base = "xsd:string">     <xsd:maxLength value = "1024"/>     <xsd:minLength value = "1"/>     <xsd:whiteSpace value = "preserve"/>    </xsd:restriction>   </xsd:simpleType>  </xsd:element>  <xsd:complexType name = "PhotoDType">   <xsd:sequence>    <xsd:element ref = "imgType" minOccurs = "0"/>    <xsd:element ref = "extRef"/>   </xsd:sequence>  </xsd:complexType>  <xsd:element name = "formatName" nillable = "true">   <xsd:simpleType>    <xsd:restriction base = "xsd:string">     <xsd:maxLength value = "256"/>     <xsd:minLength value = "1"/>     <xsd:whiteSpace value = "preserve"/>    </xsd:restriction>   </xsd:simpleType>  </xsd:element>  <xsd:element name = "name" type = "NameDType"/>  <xsd:element name = "recordInfo" type = "cmx:RecordMetaDataDType"/>  <xsd:element name = "systemRole">   <xsd:simpleType>    <xsd:restriction base = "xsd:string">     <xsd:enumeration value = "SysAdmin"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "SysSupport"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "Creator"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "AccountAdmin"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "User"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "Administrator"/>     <xsd:enumeration value = "None"/>    </xsd:restriction>   </xsd:simpleType>  </xsd:element>  <xsd:element name = "userId" type = "cmx:UserIdDType"/>  <xsd:element name = "address" type = "AddressDType"/>  <xsd:element name = "demographics" type = "DemographicsDType"/>  <xsd:element name = "institutionRole" type = "InstitutionRoleDType"/>  <xsd:element name = "tel" type = "TelDType"/>  <xsd:element name = "photo" type = "PhotoDType"/>  <xsd:complexType name = "PersonDType">   <xsd:sequence>    <xsd:element ref = "formatName" minOccurs = "0"/>    <xsd:element ref = "name" minOccurs = "0"/>    <xsd:element ref = "recordInfo" minOccurs = "0"/>    <xsd:element ref = "cmx:email" minOccurs = "0"/>    <xsd:element ref = "cmx:URL" minOccurs = "0"/>    <xsd:element ref = "systemRole" minOccurs = "0"/>    <xsd:element ref = "userId" minOccurs = "0"/>    <xsd:element ref = "address" minOccurs = "0"/>    <xsd:element ref = "demographics" minOccurs = "0"/>    <xsd:element ref = "institutionRole" minOccurs = "0" maxOccurs = "unbounded"/>    <xsd:element ref = "tel" minOccurs = "0" maxOccurs = "unbounded"/>    <xsd:element ref = "photo" minOccurs = "0"/>    <xsd:element ref = "cmx:dataSource" minOccurs = "0"/>    <xsd:element ref = "extension" minOccurs = "0"/>   </xsd:sequence>  </xsd:complexType>  <xsd:element name = "extension" type = "cmx:IMSextensionDType"/>  <xsd:element name = "nameType">   <xsd:simpleType>    <xsd:restriction base = "xsd:string">     <xsd:maxLength value = "32"/>     <xsd:minLength value = "1"/>     <xsd:whiteSpace value = "preserve"/>    </xsd:restriction>   </xsd:simpleType>  </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>
